external_references.source_name: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022
external_references.description: Unit 42. (2022, February 25). Spear Phishing Attacks Target Organizations in Ukraine, Payloads Include the Document Stealer OutSteel and the Downloader SaintBot. Retrieved June 9, 2022.

objects.description: [Saint Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1031) has delivered malicious Microsoft Office files containing an embedded JavaScript object that would, on execution, download and execute [OutSteel](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1017) and [Saint Bot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1018).(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022 )
